WITH fh AS (SELECT assigned_user_id, done_at FROM houseworks WHERE family_id = #{familyId} AND DATE(start_at) between DATE(#{from}) and DATE_ADD(DATE(#{to}), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
SELECT u.id as userId, SUM(calorie_burned) as burnedKcal, u.calorie_goal as goalKcal, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM fh WHERE assigned_user_id = u.id AND done_at IS NOT NULL) as doneHouseworkCnt, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM fh WHERE assigned_user_id = u.id) as expectedHouseworkCnt, #{from} as 'from', #{to} as 'to' FROM daily_workouts w LEFT JOIN users u on w.user_id = u.id WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM families WHERE id = #{familyId}) AND DATE(w.created_at) between DATE(#{from}) and DATE_ADD(DATE(#{to}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY user_id;
